title: The Harry Potter Post
content: Until the very end Until the very end Not my daughter you bitch It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies but just as much to stand up to our friends There are all kinds of courage It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness nothing more, You sort of start thinking anythings possible if youve got enough nerve Always How very irritating Never trust anything that can think for itself if you cant see where it keeps its brain Harry Potter Im not going to be murdered Harry said out loud  Thats the spirit dear said his mirror sleepily. Hermione Granger Really Hagrid if you are holding out for universal popularity Im afraid you will be in this cabin for a very long time Until the very end, It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies but just as much to stand up to our friends You sort of start thinking anythings possible if youve got enough nerve Really Hagrid if you are holding out for universal popularity Im afraid you will be in this cabin for a very long time Turn to page 394 Severus Snape Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesnt mean we all have Give her hell from us Peeves. It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies but just as much to stand up to our friends There are all kinds of courage Its wingardium leviOsa not leviosAH Never trust anything that can think for itself if you cant see where it keeps its brain, I am what I am an Im not ashamed Never be ashamed my ol dad used ter say theres some wholl hold it against you but theyre not worth botherin with I think Ill just go and have some pudding She needs to sort out her priorities Words are in my not so humble opinion our most inexhaustible source of magic capable of both influencing injury and remedying it Turn to page 394 10 points to Gryffindor It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness nothing more Really Hagrid if you are holding out for universal popularity Im afraid you will be in this cabin for a very long time.
